name: v1.40.4
body:
## What's Changed
* fixes air_example.toml regex expression by @jshnaidman in https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/pull/303
* Fix update ExcludeRegex to empty not work by @xiantang in https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/pull/308

## New Contributors
* @jshnaidman made their first contribution in https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/pull/303

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/compare/v1.40.3...v1.40.4

name: v1.40.3
body:
## What's Changed
* Add a Chinese version of README (#275) by @mophia in https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/pull/297
* Fix command line argument handling for slice configuration parameters by @the in https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/pull/299

## New Contributors
* @mophia made their first contribution in https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/pull/297
* @the made their first contribution in https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/pull/299

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/compare/v1.40.2...v1.40.3

name: v1.40.2
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix run process become a zombie. by @masato-hi in https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/pull/293
* Fix panic (close of closed channel) after Ctrl + C   by @xiantang in https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/pull/295

## New Contributors
* @masato-hi made their first contribution in https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/pull/293

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/compare/v1.40.1...v1.40.2

name: v1.40.1
body: **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/compare/v1.40.0...v1.40.1

name: v1.40.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix  port already used when using dlv to debug go program by @xiantang in https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/pull/259
* Try to fix cannot ctrl c when configed kill delay by @xiantang in https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/pull/287
* Docker ARM support by @borosr in https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/pull/271
* Fix air wrong image tag by @xiantang in https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/pull/289
* Add more coverage for air init  by @xiantang in https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/pull/288
* Add more coverage for air check unchanged file by @xiantang in https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/pull/290
* Feature support command line arguments when user not want use config file by @xiantang in https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/pull/180

## New Contributors
* @borosr made their first contribution in https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/pull/271

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/compare/v1.30.0...v1.40.0

name: v1.30.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Add `go install` methods to README by @silverwind in https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/pull/256
* Fix interrupt handling on darwin by @roccoblues in https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/pull/257
* Quote `config.Build.Bin` on the UNIX like OS (including WSL) by @makiuchi-d in https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/pull/179
* Revert "Quote `config.Build.Bin` on the UNIX like OS (including WSL)" by @xiantang in https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/pull/260
* Add support for runtime arguments by @lime008 in https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/pull/166
* Update example air file to document args_bin property by @gurleensethi in https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/pull/264
* NEW: Updated go to 1.18 in Docker by @Anthodev in https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/pull/268
* Using buldkit to build dockerfile by @xiantang in https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/pull/280
* Add more coverage for Run main group by @xiantang in https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/pull/284
* Add test cover for rebuild by @xiantang in https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/pull/285
* Add Test case for using ctrl c to stop engine by @xiantang in https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/pull/286

## New Contributors
* @silverwind made their first contribution in https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/pull/256
* @roccoblues made their first contribution in https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/pull/257
* @makiuchi-d made their first contribution in https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/pull/179
* @gurleensethi made their first contribution in https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/pull/264
* @Anthodev made their first contribution in https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/pull/268

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/compare/v1.28.0...v1.30.0

name: v1.12.1: Go 1.14
body:
Minor changes:
* add kill_delay [#49](https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/issues/29), credited to [wsnotify](https://github.com/wsnotify)
* build on Go1.14

name: v1.12.0: Happy New Year!
body:
Minor features:
* add stop_on_error [#38](https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/issues/38)
* add exclude_file [#39](https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/issues/39)
* add include_dir [#40](https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/issues/40)

name: v1.11.1: Keep moving!
body:
* Update third-party libraries.
* Fix [#8](https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/issues/8) and [#17](https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/issues/17) that logs display incorrectly.
* support customizing binary in config [#28](https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/issues/28).
* Support deleting tmp dir on exit [20](https://github.com/cosmtrek/air/issues/20).
